text: hello Liz - would you mind DMing me your portal id?

Wanted to ask if there is any future plans going in the directio of being able to create a headless version of the CMS or atleast being able to incorporate some sort of framework like approach to development in HubSpot (next, meteor type of stuff)
Building complex apps that are more than just single-page applications is still a massive struggle specialy when it comes to portal pages or serverless functions
